LightningComponentBundle.description: The component is used to display the list of related Sobject records for a "parent" record

property.name: sObjectName
property.label: SObject Name
property.description: SObject Name for the list of records which should be displayed

property.name: commaSeparatedRecordtypes
property.label: Record Types that should be displayed for the SObject. Use the keyword 'ALL_RECORDTYPES' for querying all recordtypes or if recordtypes are not enabled for this object
property.description: Comma separated list record types to display

property.name: fieldSetForColumns
property.label: Field Set for SObject that will be used to display the columns in the table
property.description: Name of the Field Set that will be used to to display the columns for the records

property.name: idField
property.label: Parent Object Id Field
property.description: Id Field through which the related records are associated to the parent record. If left empty, it will assume the current record Id as the parent Id field

property.name: relationshipFieldNames
property.label: Relationship Field Names
property.description: Comma Separated Field Name(s) through which the related records are associated to the parent record. If you use multiple fields, any records which are associated to this record via any of those fields will be included in the query

property.name: limitCount
property.label: How many records should be displayed by default? (max 10)

property.name: sortStatement
property.label: Sort
property.description: Sort Mode. Syntax = Field API Name and ASC/DESC e.g. CreatedDate DESC

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: An alternative title, to display as the component header

property.name: showHeader
property.label: Show Header
property.description: Whether to show Header on the component. If false, 'New' record functionality will not be available

property.name: showNewButton
property.label: Show New Button?
property.description: Whether to show New button on the component. If selected, the component will respect the SObject permissions

property.name: allowTextWrapping
property.label: Allow Text Wrapping?
property.description: Whether to allow text wrapping in Text Area fields. If false, the lines in the text area fields will be truncated

property.name: primaryRelationshipField
property.label: Primary Relationship Field Name
property.description: Field Name(s) which should be pre-populated with this recordId when clicking on the New button.

property.name: zIndex
property.label: Z-Index
property.description: Z-Index for the component - required for the custom hovers to work
